name: Dimitiros Nicolau
story: Lafteris Petridis was born and raised in Athens, Greece. He always had a passion for helping others, which led him to become a Combat Life Saver in the Greek army. Despite his young age, he has already proven himself on the battlefield, saving the lives of his fellow soldiers. Lafteris is known for his courage and dedication to his team, making him a valuable asset to the BLUFOR forces.
